title: Terror Universal
text:
Terror Universal is an American heavy metal supergroup consisting of current and former members of Soulfly, Upon a Burning Body and Ill Niño. Their first single, "Welcome to Hell", comes from their debut EP, Reign of Terror. The EP was released on February 27, 2015, in Australia and New Zealand via 3 Wise/Sony.


== Members ==

Dave Chavarri (Massacre) – drums (2014–present)
Rob Cisneros (Thrax) – lead guitar (2015–present) rhythm guitar (2014–2015)
Wacy Jahn (Plague) – vocals (2015–present)
Salvadore Dominguez (Diabolus 2) – bass, rhythm guitar (2015–present)
Former

Chad Armstrong (Rott) – vocals (2014–2015)
Ahrue Luster (Diabolus) – lead guitar (2014–2015) 
Timeline

Make Them Bleed (2018)

Reign of Terror (2015)
